data.message: I love FB but I have to report a concern. I simply want to run an ad; and the Boost feature when I attempt payment is not working. Is there anyone from FB tech support that can lend assistance. The Help prompts do not provide assistance and it is most troubling. It's Christmas time and I have been nice (not naughty) so I wish Facebook would have one of their elves help me. :)

replies.message: Hi Dana-Marie. For inquiries about ads, business Pages, and other business related questions, please visit: facebook.com/marketing. -Rey
Thank you Rey. Guess what it's working now. A Facebook elf must have stepped in :) Thanks and Happy Holidays!

btw this is my first time EVER reaching out to FB; and i'm tickled that someone from FB actually responded. It's the little things.. thanks for making me smile :) p.s. now if I could only get that infamous 'blue' check by by name lol.. guess i'm pushing it.. take care

Aw shucks, Dana-Marie. You're making us blush. As for the verification badge, we're currently only accepting requests from celebrities, government officials, sports teams and media. Thanks for stopping by and we hope you have a great day! -Rey
Isn't that sweet!!!!! It just tickles me plum pink
